message_for_player.text: You have received an ANTIDOTE PACKAGE from a donator! A milk bucket, other health boosts and the head of the donator have been added to your inventory.
You have received a KNOCKBACK PACKAGE from a donator! A Teeter Yeeterâ„¢ and the head of the donator have been added to your inventory.
You have received a BOOM PACKAGE from a donator! 10 Coconut Bombs and the head of the donator have been added to your inventory.
You have received an INVISIBILITY PACKAGE from a donator! You are invisible for 60 seconds and the head of the donator has been added to your inventory.
You have received an UNDYING PACKAGE from a donator! A Totem of Undying and the head of the donator have been added to your inventory.
OH NO! You have received a SLOWNESS SABOTAGE from a donator! You now have Slowness for 60 seconds and the head of the donator has been added to your inventory.
OH NO! You have received a HUNGER SABOTAGE from a donator! You now have Hunger for 60 seconds and the head of the donator has been added to your inventory.
OH NO! Someone donated a RANDOM CREEPER SABOTAGE, and unfortunately RNG has decided you received it! A Creeper has been spawned near you and the head of the donator has been added to your inventory.
OH NO! Someone has donated a PLAYER SWAP SABOTAGE! All players have been swapped positions.
OH NO! You have received a CHOSEN CREEPER SABOTAGE from a donator! A Creeper has been spawned near you and the head of the donator has been added to your inventory.
OH NO! You have received a CHOSEN LIGHTNING STRIKE from a donator! A lightning strike has hit you and the head of the donator has been added to your inventory.
OH NO! a LIGHTNING STORM from a donator has started! The head of the donator has been added to your inventory.
OH NO! Someone has donated a ZOMBIE INVASION SABOTAGE! Zombies have invaded the map.
EVERYONE RUN! RUN FOR YOUR LIVES! Someone has donated a WITHER SABOTAGE! A horrific Wither has spawned on the map.
Oh no! You are now wearing the head of a donator, and there is nothing you can do about that!
Pffff- where did that pufferfish come from? A certain donator might know.
